products.name: Lead Sealant 310ml – Waterproof Roofing Joint Sealant
products.description: High-quality lead sealant designed for making watertight, flexible joints between lead flashings and masonry or brickwork. Ideal for roof and gutter repairs, it offers excellent adhesion, weather resistance, and long-lasting performance. Easy to apply with a standard sealant gun.
products.seoTitle: Lead Sealant 310ml | Roofing & Flashing Sealant | Waterproof
products.seoDescription: Buy premium Lead Sealant 310ml – perfect for watertight, flexible joints between lead and brickwork. Durable, weatherproof, and easy to apply.
